screeningSummary: Prank caller with debunked moon landing theory - admits to testing the host

textVariants.text: You're on the air. What's the conspiracy?
Alright, you're on. What's the conspiracy?
YOU ARE ON THE AIR! What's the CONSPIRACY?!
You're on. What's this about?
You're on. So?
Oh good, a conspiracy theorist! What's the theory?!
You're on. State your conspiracy hypothesis concisely.

dialogue.speaker: Caller
dialogue.text: Okay, so I have this theory about the moon landing. It was filmed in a warehouse in Nevada, Vern. The flag was waving because there was a fan in the studio!

textVariants.text: A fan in the studio. That's been thoroughly debunked. The flag had a horizontal rod to keep it extended. Any other theories?
A fan in the studio... that's been debunked. The flag had a rod. Other theories?
A FAN IN THE STUDIO! This is AMAZING! Wait - it's been DEBUNKED!
A fan in the studio. Let me guess - the flag had a rod? Any other theories?
Fan in the studio. Debunked. The flag had a rod. What else?
A FAN IN THE STUDIO! This is PERFECT radio! But wait - it's been DEBUNKED!
Horizontal rod mechanism has been extensively documented. What additional hypotheses do you possess?

dialogue.speaker: Caller
dialogue.text: Well, no, but think about it - the astronauts never went back! Why wouldn't they go back if they really landed?!

textVariants.text: We did go back. Apollo 12, 14, 15, 16, and 17 all landed. Multiple missions over several years.
We did go back... Apollo 12, 14, 15, 16, 17... multiple missions...
WE DID GO BACK! Apollo 12, 14, 15, 16, and 17! MULTIPLE MISSIONS!
We did go back. Apollo 12, 14, 15, 16, and 17. Multiple landings. Any other theories?
We went back. Multiple missions. What's your next theory?
WE WENT BACK! Five more landings! This is GREAT radio!
Apollo missions 12, 14, 15, 16, and 17 successfully landed. Additional lunar missions occurred. What else?

dialogue.speaker: Caller
dialogue.text: Oh. I... I didn't know that part.

textVariants.text: There's a documentary about this. It's widely available. Next caller.
There's documentaries about this... widely available. Next.
There's DOCUMENTARIES about this! It's all ONLINE! Next caller!
There's a documentary. It's available. Next caller.
Documentary exists. Next caller.
It's all DOCUMENTED! Available everywhere! This is WHY I love this show! NEXT!
Comprehensive documentation is readily accessible through standard research channels. Next caller.

dialogue.speaker: Caller
dialogue.text: *laughing* Okay okay, I was just testing you! You passed! Great show, Vern!

arcNotes: Obvious prank, moon landing debunked on air, self-aware humor
